name: CardsofWonder
0:
”Alexa open Cards of Wonder”
”Alexa play Cards of Wonder”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cards of wonder
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In Cards of Wonder, you can collect and battle your cards. Battle against Alexa to gain or lose cards and gain wonder coins. Battle against another random player to gain coins and leaderboard ranking. Come back each day to receive free stuff which can include wondercoins and cards. You may play against Alexa and a random player once per day. For those with visual devices you can see all your cards that you have collected and the battling of the cards. You can unlock bonus cards and wonder coins just by collecting the cards type and rarity. 

 ☠ Over 160 Cards 
 ☠ Common, Uncommon, Rare and Epic cards 
 ☠ Silver, Gold and Platinum Booster Packs 
 ☠ Video and Image cards
